Chopper Attack
Exit
Settings
A simple helicopter game where the copter is faulty and the objective is to reach base,the mission is to avoid missiles and enemy helicopters.
Splash Screen
splash startup picture

Play
High Scores
Help
CONTROLS\n Touch the screen to move up and leave the screen to move down.
\n\nABOUT\n Chopper Attack is an endless flying game. You are returning from tour and your helicopter is damaged, the mission is to avoid missiles and obstacles while keeping your helicopter in the air for as long as you can.
